column4: hey guys i am trying to install msttcorefonts  using sudo apt-get install msttcorefonts  and i get the following error E: Package msttcorefonts has no installation candidate
do you have a package ttf-mscorefonts-installer ?  not-sure you will.
it should be "sudo apt-get install ttf-mscorefonts-installer"
did you try "sudo apt-get install ttf-mscorefonts-installer" ?
